title: Handle Field Audit of a Business
description: An IRS agent is conducting a field audit at a client's place of business. The tax professional is representing the client.

tasks.description: Act as the primary point of contact for the IRS agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent manages all communication with the auditor.

tasks.description: Respond to Information Document Requests (IDRs) from the auditor in a timely manner.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the requested documentation promptly and accurately.

tasks.description: Negotiate with the auditor on any proposed adjustments to the tax return.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent advocates for the client's position to minimize any additional tax.
